verses.verse: When Jesus <WG2424> had spoken <WG3004> these <WG3778> words, He went <WG1831> forth <WG1831> with His disciples <WG3101> over <WG4008> the ravine <WG5493> of the Kidron, <WG2748> where <WG3699> there was a garden, <WG2779> into which <WG3739> He Himself <WG846> entered, <WG1525> and His disciples. <WG3101>

Now <WG1161> Judas <WG2455> also, <WG2532> who was betraying <WG3860> Him, knew <WG3609> the place; <WG5117> for Jesus <WG2424> had often <WG4178> met <WG4863> there <WG1563> with His disciples. <WG3101>

Judas <WG2455> then, <WG3767> having received <WG2983> the [Roman] cohort, <WG4686> and officers <WG5257> from the chief <WG749> priests <WG749> and the Pharisees, <WG5330> came <WG2064> there <WG1563> with lanterns <WG5322> and torches <WG2985> and weapons. <WG3696>

Jesus <WG2424> therefore, <WG3767> knowing <WG3609> all <WG3956> the things <WG3956> that were coming <WG2064> upon Him, went <WG1831> forth, <WG1831> and said <WG3004> to them, "Whom <WG5101> do you seek <WG2212>?"

They answered <WG611> Him, "Jesus <WG2424> the Nazarene. <WG3480>" He said <WG3004> to them, "I am <WG1510> [He.]" And Judas <WG2455> also <WG2532> who was betraying <WG3860> Him, was standing <WG2476> with them.
When <WG5613> therefore <WG3767> He said <WG3004> to them, "I am <WG1510> [He]," they drew <WG565> back, <WG3694> and fell <WG4098> to the ground. <WG5476>
Again <WG3825> therefore <WG3767> He asked <WG1905> them, "Whom <WG5101> do you seek <WG2212>?" And they said, <WG3004> "Jesus <WG2424> the Nazarene. <WG3480>"
Jesus <WG2424> answered, <WG611> "I told <WG3004> you that I am <WG1510> [He]; if <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> you seek <WG2212> Me, let <WG863> these <WG3778> go <WG5217> their way, <WG5217>"
that the word <WG3056> might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3739> He spoke, <WG3004> "Of those whom <WG3739> Thou hast given <WG1325> Me I lost <WG622> not one. <WG3762>"

Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> therefore <WG3767> having <WG2192> a sword, <WG3162> drew <WG1670> it, and struck <WG3817> the high <WG749> priest's slave, <WG1401> and cut <WG609> off <WG609> his right <WG1188> ear; <WG5621> and the slave's name <WG3686> was Malchus. <WG3124>

Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to Peter, <WG4074> "Put <WG906> the sword <WG3162> into the sheath; <WG2336> the cup <WG4221> which <WG3739> the Father <WG3962> has given <WG1325> Me, shall I not drink <WG4095> it?"
So <WG3767> the [Roman] cohort <WG4686> and the commander, <WG5506> and the officers <WG5257> of the Jews, <WG2453> arrested <WG4815> Jesus <WG2424> and bound <WG1210> Him,
and led <WG71> Him to Annas <WG452> first; <WG4413> for he was father-in-law of Caiaphas, <WG2533> who <WG3739> was high <WG749> priest <WG749> that year. <WG1763>

Now <WG1161> Caiaphas <WG2533> was the one who had advised <WG4823> the Jews <WG2453> that it was expedient <WG4851> for one <WG1520> man <WG444> to die <WG599> on behalf <WG5228> of the people. <WG2992>

And Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> was following <WG190> Jesus, <WG2424> and [so was] another <WG243> disciple. <WG3101> Now <WG1161> that disciple <WG3101> was known <WG1110> to the high <WG749> priest, <WG749> and entered <WG4897> with Jesus <WG2424> into the court <WG833> of the high <WG749> priest, <WG749>

but Peter <WG4074> was standing <WG2476> at the door <WG2374> outside. <WG1854> So <WG3767> the other <WG243> disciple, <WG3101> who was known <WG1110> to the high <WG749> priest, <WG749> went <WG1831> out and spoke <WG3004> to the doorkeeper, <WG2377> and brought <WG1521> in Peter. <WG4074>

The slave-girl therefore <WG3767> who kept <WG2377> the door <WG2377> said <WG3004> to Peter, <WG4074> "You are not also <WG2532> [one] of this <WG3778> man's disciples, <WG3101> are you?" He said, <WG3004> "I am <WG1510> not."

Now <WG1161> the slaves <WG1401> and the officers <WG5257> were standing <WG2476> [there,] having made <WG4160> a charcoal <WG439> fire, <WG439> for it was cold <WG5592> and they were warming <WG2328> themselves; and Peter <WG4074> also <WG2532> was with them, standing <WG2476> and warming <WG2328> himself.
The high <WG749> priest <WG749> therefore <WG3767> questioned <WG2065> Jesus <WG2424> about <WG4012> His disciples, <WG3101> and about <WG4012> His teaching. <WG1322>

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> him, "I have spoken <WG2980> openly <WG3954> to the world; <WG2889> I always <WG3842> taught <WG1321> in synagogues, <WG4864> and in the temple, <WG2413> where <WG3699> all <WG3956> the Jews <WG2453> come <WG4905> together; <WG4905> and I spoke <WG2980> nothing <WG3762> in secret. <WG2927>

"Why <WG5101> do you question <WG2065> Me? Question <WG2065> those <WG3588> who have heard <WG191> what <WG5101> I spoke <WG2980> to them; behold, <WG2396> these <WG3778> know <WG3609> what <WG3739> I said. <WG3004>"

And when He had said <WG3004> this, <WG3778> one <WG1520> of the officers <WG5257> standing <WG3936> by gave <WG1325> Jesus <WG2424> a blow, <WG4475> saying, <WG3004> "Is that the way <WG3779> You answer <WG611> the high <WG749> priest <WG749>?"

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> him, "If <WG1487> I have spoken <WG2980> wrongly, <WG2560> bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of the wrong; <WG2556> but if <WG1487> rightly, <WG2573> why <WG5101> do you strike <WG1194> Me?"
Annas <WG452> therefore <WG3767> sent <WG649> Him bound <WG1210> to Caiaphas <WG2533> the high <WG749> priest. <WG749>

Now <WG1161> Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> was standing <WG2476> and warming <WG2328> himself. They said <WG3004> therefore <WG3767> to him, "You are not also <WG2532> [one] of His disciples, <WG3101> are you?" He denied <WG720> [it], and said, <WG3004> "I am <WG1510> not."

One <WG1520> of the slaves <WG1401> of the high <WG749> priest, <WG749> being <WG1510> a relative <WG4773> of the one whose <WG3739> ear <WG5621> Peter <WG4074> cut <WG609> off, <WG609> said, <WG3004> "Did I not see <WG3708> you in the garden <WG2779> with Him?"
Peter <WG4074> therefore <WG3767> denied <WG720> [it] again; <WG3825> and immediately <WG2112> a cock <WG220> crowed. <WG5455>

They led <WG71> Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> from Caiaphas <WG2533> into the Praetorium, <WG4232> and it was early; <WG4404> and they themselves <WG846> did not enter <WG1525> into the Praetorium <WG4232> in order <WG2443> that they might not be defiled, <WG3392> but might eat <WG2068> the Passover. <WG3957>
Pilate <WG4091> therefore <WG3767> went <WG1831> out to them, and said, <WG5346> "What <WG5101> accusation <WG2724> do you bring <WG5342> against this <WG3778> Man <WG444>?"
They answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to him, "If <WG1487> this <WG3778> Man <WG3778> were not an evildoer, <WG2556> we would not have delivered <WG3860> Him up to you."

Pilate <WG4091> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to them, "Take <WG2983> Him yourselves, <WG4771> and judge <WG2919> Him according <WG2596> to your law. <WG3551>" The Jews <WG2453> said <WG3004> to him, "We are not permitted <WG1832> to put <WG615> anyone <WG3762> to death, <WG615>"

that the word <WG3056> of Jesus <WG2424> might be fulfilled, <WG4137> which <WG3739> He spoke, <WG3004> signifying <WG4591> by what <WG4169> kind <WG4169> of death <WG2288> He was about <WG3195> to die. <WG599>

Pilate <WG4091> therefore <WG3767> entered <WG1525> again <WG3825> into the Praetorium, <WG4232> and summoned <WG5455> Jesus, <WG2424> and said <WG3004> to Him, "Are You the King <WG935> of the Jews <WG2453>?"
Jesus <WG2424> answered, <WG611> "Are you saying <WG3004> this <WG3778> on your own <WG1438> initiative, <WG1438> or <WG2228> did others <WG243> tell <WG3004> you about <WG4012> Me?"

Pilate <WG4091> answered, <WG611> "I am <WG1510> not a Jew, <WG2453> am I? Your own nation <WG1484> and the chief <WG749> priests <WG749> delivered <WG3860> You up to me; what <WG5101> have You done <WG4160>?"

Jesus <WG2424> answered, <WG611> "My kingdom <WG932> is not of this <WG3778> world. <WG2889> If <WG1487> My kingdom <WG932> were of this <WG3778> world, <WG2889> then My servants <WG5257> would be fighting, <WG75> that I might not be delivered <WG3860> up to the Jews; <WG2453> but as it is, My kingdom <WG932> is not of this <WG1782> realm. <WG1782>"

Pilate <WG4091> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to Him, "So <WG3766> You are a king <WG935>?" Jesus <WG2424> answered, <WG611> "You say <WG3004> [correctly] that I am <WG1510> a king. <WG935> For this <WG3778> I have been born, <WG1080> and for this <WG3778> I have come <WG2064> into the world, <WG2889> to bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> to the truth. <WG225> Everyone <WG3956> who is of the truth <WG225> hears <WG191> My voice. <WG5456>"

Pilate <WG4091> said <WG3004> to Him, "What <WG5101> is truth <WG225>?" And when he had said <WG3004> this, <WG3778> he went <WG1831> out again <WG3825> to the Jews, <WG2453> and said <WG3004> to them, "I find <WG2147> no <WG3762> guilt <WG156> in Him.

"But you have a custom, <WG4914> that I should release <WG630> someone <WG1520> for you at the Passover; <WG3957> do you wish <WG1014> then <WG3767> that I release <WG630> for you the King <WG935> of the Jews <WG2453>?"
Therefore <WG3767> they cried <WG2905> out again, <WG3825> saying, <WG3004> "Not this <WG3778> Man, <WG3778> but Barabbas. <WG912>" Now <WG1161> Barabbas <WG912> was a robber. <WG3027>
